name: drifting away (jp dizon)
description:
OBJECTIVE: Bring the wood back to the surface then bring the wood to fix the boat.

CONTROLS: PRESS & HOLD TO USE

Q - Rotate Left

E - Rotate Right

A - Left Arm

D - Right Arm

SHIFT - Use to move arms without gaining momentum

SPACE - Diving

MOUSE - Move in the direction you want to move your arms

LMB - Push Wood (Can only be used when wood is on the surface)

TIP: Don't hold A or D while holding SPACE
